org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.tasks
Interface FileNameChangeSpec

All Superinterfaces:
FileBrowserTaskSpec, FileTaskSpec, TaskSpec
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFileNameChangeSpec
public interface FileNameChangeSpec
extends FileBrowserTaskSpec

Describes a file name change task to perform. The file name change task will the change the file name of a file object at a specified file location to the specified file name. This is sometimes referred to as a file "rename" task spec.

          Returns the location of the file object to rename.
